item.title: Configure customer-managed keys for your existing Azure Cosmos DB accounts!
item.description: Encryption options for data at rest on Azure Cosmos DB that is available today. Azure Cosmos DB strives to provide the best-in-class security features. item.title: Windows Terminal Preview 1.21 Release
item.description: Windows Terminal is back with another preview release! Windows Terminal Preview 1.21 introduces long-awaited features like Buffer Restore and fontfall back as well as new experimental features like Scratchpad and the ability to load up an image as a texture. There’s also a LOT MORE stuff so check out the rest of this blog post to learn more! Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/commandline/windows-terminal-preview-1-21-release
